description: {"blocks":[{"key":"unv0","text":"This protocol is for dA-tailing, which is an enzymatic method for adding a non-templated nucleotide to the 3' end of a blunt, double-stranded DNA molecule. In other words, this puts A-chains on the end of our PCR product, creating a site for the ligation adapter to attach to. Simple process - create a reaction with three chemicals, cleanup the product with beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6soud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u8h","text":"Time required: ~45 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"401so","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q8rf","text":"Adapted from dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.yxmvmnze9g3p/v3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dm07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ihnk","text":"The NEB protocol this is based on can be found here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":17}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9CAD15AEFA7911EE99240A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.yxmvmnze9g3p/v3"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"93CD14A1C09C11ED92D30A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/protocols/2015/08/13/protocol-for-use-with-nebnext-ultra-ii-end-repair-da-tailing-module-e7546"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"879vm","text":"Put a 1.5mL aliquot of fresh molecular water on a heat block at  . This will be used after the cleanup step towards the end of this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agiv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72a20","text":"Turn on your PCR thermal cycler so that the heated lid begins to come up to temp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dct1c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b74m","text":"Take out the materials for library prep from the freezer. Flick mix and then spin down both NEB enzymes and immediately place on ice. Thaw the NEB Next dA tailing buffer at room temperature and vortex to completely dissolve precipitate, then spin down. Thaw the AXP beads from the kit at room temperature and do not place on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":193,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":308,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":204,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vas4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ca12","text":"Do not vortex enzymes!. {"blocks":[{"key":"c8o9i","text":"With the tube still on the magnet, add   of 80% ethanol to the tube and let sit for  . Try to minimize disturbance of the beads. {"blocks":[{"key":"952hu","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"02339DD0D8A311EC90060A58A9FEAC02","id":"82200","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nl3p","text":"Place the tube back on the magnet for   or until the solution is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bktn9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"2DA13050D8A311ECB2D87BFDB35A3B57","id":"82201","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cqkg","text":"Transfer the water containing the DNA to a new 1.5mL LoBind eppi tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"97in5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9r1qk","text":"You should now have your A-tailed DNA template.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18l87","text":"It is recommended to go directly into adapter ligation, however you may take a break and leave the A-tailed library at   for up to 24 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a8lpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
